name: Bashful, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, if a card named "Cursed Girl" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. [AUTO] Experience ［(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is four or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, seach your deck for up to one card named "Cursed Girl", reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText: Shinobu?

name: Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose up to two of your other characters, and those characters get +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. [AUTO] Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is four or higher, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: So if you see me, please say hi.

name: Koyomi Araragi on Mother's Day
text: [CONT] During your turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. [AUTO] When this card or another of your 《Strange》 characters is placed on stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. （Return the card you saw to its original place）
flavorText:
You get lost--- because
you follow it?

name: Wandering Girl, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [CONT] If you have another 《Blood》 character, this card gets +2000 power. [ACT] Brainstorm ［(1) [REST] two of your characters］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Lost Cattle, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a climax, return this card to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. （If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place.)

name: Girl Lost in the Snail, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +500 power and "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".

name: Shinobu Oshino the Vampire
text: [CONT] During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. [CONT] During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from hand.

name: Enthusiastic Girl, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO][Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your level and a card in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText: Um…… It was just like a Takkyuudou.

name: Wreck of a Former Vampire, Shinobu Oshino
text: [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].)
flavorText: "The wreck of a former vampire. The dregs of a beautiful demon. I mean, what good would it do to describe her like that?

name: Shy Girl, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO] When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your yellow characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 1000, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.）

name: Looking Down on Koyomi, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO] Change ［(3) Put this card into your waiting room］ At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is [REST], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Wandering Spirit, Mayoi Hachikuji" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Koyomi, did you say. Sounds like a girl's name.

name: Wandering Spirit, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO]［(2)] When this card attacks, if a card named "MAYOI Mai Mai" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "[AUTO] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent."（This damage may be canceled.）

name: "Not on Purpose"Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [CONT] Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. [ACT]［(2)］ Choose an opponent's level 0 or less character, and return it to your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Sorry. I flubbed it.

name: Human-looking Vampire, Shinobu Oshino
text: [AUTO] Bond／"Vampire-looking Human, Koyomi Araragi" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Vampire-looking Human, Koyomi Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.) [ACT]［(1)] Choose one of your 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: Vampire-looking Human, Koyomi Araragi
text: [CONT] If you have another character with "Shinobu" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].)

name: Shinobu Oshino
text: [AUTO]［Put a character on your stage into the waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Maintaining Existence" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Hungry, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO]［(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
But never mind that, Mr. Araragi.
I'm hungry, you know?

name: Self-proclaimed 500 Years Old, Shinobu Oshino
text: [CONT] If the number of cards in your stock is five or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText:
"The Sawari Neko, which could also be considered the personification of Hanekawa's stress, vanished thanks to
Shinobu's Energy Drain."

name: Real Fight
text: All of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: "Here we see a high school boy pretending to be nihilistic and looking rather dejected, after twice unleashing his fists on a grade school girl and knocking her unconscious."

name: Tongue Twister
text: Search your deck for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText:
Then, say: "Nama-mumi, nama-mome,
nama-mamamo" three times.

name: Maintaining Existence
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: MAYOI Mai Mai
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Cursed Girl
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Family Circumstance, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [CONT] All of your 《Strange》 characters get +500 power and the following ability. "[ACT]［[REST] one of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn." [AUTO]［(1) Put this card into your waiting room］ When a card named "Secret Reward" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Energy Drain"Black Hanekawa" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Now that it's finally the long-awaited Golden Week, aren't you going to study or whatever?

name: Girl Who Wished on the Monkey, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO]［(1)］ When a card named "SURUGA Monkey" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on the center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, you may search your deck for up to two characters with different card names, and reveal them to your opponent. Then, your opponent chooses one of those cards, put the chosen card into your waiting room, and put the rest into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Suruga Kanbaru Had a Breakthrough
text: [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is six or higher, the character facing this card gets -1 soul.
flavorText: Good morning, Araragi.

name: Hitagi Senjyogahara on Holiday
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is not a 《Strange》 character, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Just think of it as the same as Araragi being able to differentiate girls by the shape of their hips.

name: Sharp Tongue, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [AUTO][Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "Girl With No Weight" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get +1 level and +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Koyomi's Lover, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] Experience This card gets +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the total level of cards in your level.

name: Suruga Kanbaru
text: [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, this card gets +1000 power and "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］". [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Monkey's Paw? Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, choose another of your 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. [AUTO] Bond／"Sharp Tongue, Hitagi Senjyogahara" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Sharp Tongue, Hitagi Senjyogahara" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: To be able to guess the truth without any prior knowledge.

name: Honest With Yourself, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [CONT] If this card is on the middle position of the center stage, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: Oh, right. You have no background in BL, do you. How surprising.

name: During a Date, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [AUTO] Change ［(2) Put this card into your waiting room］ At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is [REST], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Koyomi's Lover, Hitagi Senjyogahara" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 2000, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.）

name: Dislikes Mornings, Koyomi Araragi
text: [CONT] If you do not have another character with either "Karen" or "Tsukihi" in its card name, this card cannot [STAND] during your stand phase.

name: Aggressive Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. [ACT]［(1) [REST] this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We're going on a date.

name: Good Knowledge and Memory, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [ACT]［(1) [REST] this card］ Choose one of your 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: I don't know everything. I only know what I know.

name: Former Basketball Ace, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, you may choose a climax in your climax area, and put it into your stock.

name: Great With Women, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [ACT]［[REST] one of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Dealing with younger girls is certainly my forte.

name: Protagonist Who Helps All, Koyomi Araragi
text: [CONT] If the number of cards in your stock is five or more, all of your other 《Strange》 characters get +500 power.

name: Great Voice Imitation? Hitagi Senjyogahara
flavorText: I'll imitate your voice, so you have nothing to worry about. Just leave it to me.

name: Very Honest, Suruga Kanbaru
flavorText: Allow me to apologize to you for what happened last night.

name: Proper Manners, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.）
flavorText: That's not what I'm saying. I meant that Ms. Kanbaru must have given you a hard time.

name: The Best Class Rep, Tsubasa Hanekawa
flavorText: Huh? Araragi, you're still here?

name: Stalking
text: [COUNTER] Choose up to two of your 《Strange》 characters, and those characters get +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Rainy Devil
text: Choose up to one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn.

name: SURUGA Monkey
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: "I'm sorry I made you wait for so long."

name: Girl With No Weight
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Secret Reward
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: All right, go ahead.

name: Girl With Twintails, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, if a card named "Flubbing Girl" is in your climax area, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. Then, at the beginning of your encore step, return this card to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards. [AUTO] Experience When this character's level 1 or higher battle opponent becomes [REVERSE], if the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, you may put that character on top of your opponent's deck.

name: Girl Who Met a Crab, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is six or higher, this card gets +500 power and the following ability. "[AUTO]［(1)］ When this character's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes [REVERSE], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 1 or less characters, and put it into your opponent's waiting room." [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Criticizing Role, Koyomi Araragi
text: [CONT] If you are at level 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "[ACT]［(3) Put the top card of your deck into your clock］ Choose a card named "Girl Who Met a Crab, Hitagi Senjyogahara" in your hand, and put it on any position of your stage." [CONT] All of your other characters with "Hitagi" in its card name get +500 power.
flavorText: No way, that was on purpose……

name: Big Backpack, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, choose another of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. [AUTO] When this card becomes [REVERSE], if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may [REVERSE] that character.
flavorText: Anyone would turn around if they got clobbered from behind!

name: Girl Who Cannot Be Left Alone, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] If you do not have any other characters, this card gets +1500 power and "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".

name: Demon's Left Hand, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [CONT] If you have another character with "Hitagi" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. [AUTO]［(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "After The Demon Has Left" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent. （This damage may be canceled）
flavorText: After all, everything ended up so half-baked.

name: Fully Armed, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Strange》 characters. [AUTO] When this card attacks, if a card named "HITAGI Crab" is in your climax area, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Tsukihi Araragi
text: [CONT] Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. [ACT]［(2) [REST] this card] Search your deck for up to one character with "Koyomi" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Honest Feelings, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] All of your other characters named "Reply to a Confession, Koyomi Araragi" get +1000 power. [AUTO] Bond／"Reply to a Confession, Koyomi Araragi" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Reply to a Confession, Koyomi Araragi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Sports Girl, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO] Change ［(2) Put this card into your waiting room］ At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is [REST], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Demon's Left Hand, Suruga Kanbaru" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Battle Ready, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [ACT]［(1)］ Until end of turn, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability."[AUTO] When this card's battle opponent becomes [REVERSE], you may put that character on top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: Oh, my mistake--- "You can move, but it will be very dangerous." is what I really should have said.

name: Karen Araragi
text: [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].) [ACT]［(2)] This card gets +5000 power until end of turn.

name: Karen Araragi & Tsukihi Araragi
text: [AUTO]［(2)］ When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage,you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Strange》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Shy Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 2000, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.）

name: Girl Who Lost All Weight, Hitagi Senjyogahara
Hitagi Senjyogahara in Regular Clothes
text: [AUTO] When another of your 《Strange》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Elementary Student, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [CONT] If the number of other 《Strange》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Reply to a Confession, Koyomi Araragi
flavorText:
Pretending you can see things that you really can't, or pretending not to be able to see things that you actually can, there'll be none of that from here on in.
If we don't agree on something, then let's sit down and talk about it.

name: Loves BL, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].)

name: Awakening Ritual
text: Each player returns all cards in the waiting room to his or her deck. Each player shuffles his or her deck afterwards.

name: Tsundere?
text: Choose up to two characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: What about that girl, Araragi?

name: HITAGI Crab
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. （[COME BACK]: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: "This girl, Senjyogahara, had almost no weight, or anything that could be called weight, to speak of."

name: Flubbing Girl
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I fwubbed it.

name: After The Demon Has Left
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: The demon may have left me, but in the end, my arm didn't go back to normal.

name: Girl Charmed By a Cat, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [CONT] Assist All of your 《Strange》 characters in front of this card get +2000 power and the following ability. "[AUTO]［(1)］ When this card's battle opponent becomes [REVERSE], you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck." [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Girl Bound By a Snake, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. [AUTO] When this card attacks, if a card named "NADEKO Snake" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to two cards named "Girl Bound By a Snake, Nadeko Sengoku", reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Classmate of Tsukihi, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [CONT] Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. [ACT]［(1) [REST] this card］ Choose one of your characters, and it gets "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］" until end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Uh, um……

name: Inner Feelings, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [AUTO] Experience ［(2)］ When you use this card's "Backup", if the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in battle, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn. [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 1500, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.）

name: Lovers, Koyomi Araragi & Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +500 power and "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character in your hand into your waiting room］". [AUTO]［(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Everything About Me" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to five cards from the top of your deck, search for up to one 《Strange》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Black Hanekawa
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, if a card named "TSUBASA Cat" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as a character on your stage, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].)
flavorText: Meow?

name: Curse-lifting Gratitude, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO] When this card is frontal attacked, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Strange》 character, until end of turn, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "[AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavorText: "Don't say that. Sengoku. Please, don't say things like 'thank you' to me."

name: Nadeko Sengoku
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, your other character on the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. [ACT]［(1)］ Draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Meme Oshino
text: [AUTO]［(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your level and a card in your waiting room, and exchange them.

name: Tsubasa Hanekawa in Pajamas
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Strange》 characters you have.

name: Paranormal Authority, Meme Oshino
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. [ACT] Brainstorm ［(1)］ Reveal two cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, draw a card.
flavorText: I get it, this is that thing, this is that "Founder's Anniversary" thing I keep hearing about, right?

name: Girl Under a Curse, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power. [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as [REST].)

name: Ambush, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [AUTO] Change ［(1) Put this card into your clock］ At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is [REST], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Girl Bound By a Snake, Nadeko Sengoku" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Ah…… Big Brother Koyomi. I've been waiting for you.

name: Koyomi Araragi Running Around
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Class Representative》 characters get +500 power. [AUTO] Bond／"Tsubasa Hanekawa" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Tsubasa Hanekawa" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
That's an idea that Oshino had, too……
But we don't know what the root of her stress is, remember?

name: Curse-lifting Ritual, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Tsubasa Hanekawa Knows Everything
text: [ACT]
flavorText: Really? I'm just normal.

name: Maturing Girl, Nadeko Sengoku
flavorText:
Koyomi…… and Ms. Kanbaru.
Could you…… turn around for a bit, please?

name: Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [CONT] Assist All of your level 2 or higher characters in front of this card get +1000 power. [CONT] Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is four or higher, this card gets the following ability. "[CONT] During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Strange》 characters get +500 power."
flavorText: Coming from you, Araragi, that's really cocky.

name: All-seeing Guy, Meme Oshino
text: [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] （Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.）
flavorText: I'm so busy that I don't have much time to spare.

name: "Energy Drain"Black Hanekawa
text: [CONT] You cannot use the "[AUTO] Encore" of your other characters. （You cannot use the "[AUTO] Encore ［(3)］" rule either.)

name: Keep This a Secret
text: Draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Choose one of your 《Strange》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: NADEKO Snake
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Please look at me, Big Brother Koyomi.

name: Everything About Me
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: TSUBASA Cat
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Meaning you're still the same old good-for-nothing.

name: Motionless Silence, Koyomi Araragi
text: [AUTO] ［Return two characters in your waiting room to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards］ When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Highly Suspicious Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [AUTO] When this card attacks, choose up to two of your ?Strange? characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: If she's of no concern, then that's fine with me.

name: Daughter of a Proper Family, Senjyogahara Hitagi
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may choose a ?Strange? character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. [ACT]

name: Weight Crab
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Just like last time, it's a giant crab, I see--- a giant crab.

name: Ultimate Honor Student, Tsubasa Hanekawa
text: [CONT] Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Athletics Type, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [CONT] All of your other characters get +500 power.

name: New Breed of Strange, Black Hanekawa
Pure-looking Clothes, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [CONT] All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Menacing Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: 【ACT】 ［(1) 【REST】 one of your characters] This card gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Karen Araragi & Tsukihi Araragi
text: [AUTO]［②］ When this card is put into the waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one ?Strange? character in your waiting room, and put it into your hand.

name: Battle Ready, Hitagi Senjyogahara
text: [ACT]［①］ Until end of turn, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "[AUTO]When this card's battle opponent becomes [REVERSE], you may put that character on top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: Oh, my mistake--- "You can move, but it will be very dangerous." is what I really should have said.

name: Shy Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [ACT][COUNTER] Backup 2000, Level 1 ［① Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)

name: Girl Who Lost All Weight, Hitagi Senjyogahara
Hitagi Senjyogahara in Regular Clothes
text: [AUTO] When another of your ?Strange? character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
No…… Um, I'm very sorry to tell you that if you wanted me to do those things forever, I don't think I'd be able
to keep up with you……

name: Elementary Student, Mayoi Hachikuji
text: [CONT] If the number of other ?Strange? characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText:
And Ms. Senjyogahara, on the
other hand, is your girlfriend.

name: Loves BL, Suruga Kanbaru
text: [AUTO] Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］ （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as[REST].）

name: HITAGI Crab
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. （[COME BACK]： When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: "This girl, Senjyogahara, had almost no weight, or anything that could be called weight, to speak of."

name: Curse-lifting Ritual, Nadeko Sengoku
text: [CONT] During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Tsubasa Hanekawa in Pajamas
text: [AUTO] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of ?Strange? characters you have.

name: Maturing Girl, Nadeko Sengoku
flavorText:
Koyomi…… and Ms. Kanbaru.
Could you…… turn around for a bit, please?

name: Everything About Me
text: [CONT] All of your characters get +2 soul.
